v0.1.0-alpha.2

Building beautiful sites just got easier

With a grid that adapts to your style

Getting Started

Clone from Git

git clone https://github.com:MarginZero/Stylistic 
cd Stylistic 
npm install 
gulp

Install via Bower

bower install stylistic#v0.1.0-alpha.2

Download the archive

Download
